title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Mamba with a response to a comment mischaracterizing a lot of what happened in the last several years: Why do you lie so transparently. It’s fucking pathetic. The Muller Special Counsel indicted 34 people: 26 Russian nationals(some, known members of the GRU), 3 Russian […]
